text: @realDonaldTrump Just like you've tried to erase and achievement of president Obama,  the next president will erase all of yours but the stain of 100,000+ covid19 deaths and the many protests due to the racist police will remain as your legacy!  You'll be remembered as a divider 45, not great!!
